title: Fix Awards & Recognition photos not displaying on About and Home pages

requirements.text: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx) so that all 7 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg, award-photo-02.jpeg, award-photo-04.jpeg, award-photo-05.jpeg, award-photo-06.jpeg, award-photo-07.jpeg, award-photo-08.jpeg) render visibly. Completely rewrite the awards rendering block: remove all dynamic/template-literal src construction, inline event handlers, lazy loading, and conditional rendering. Each must use a fully hardcoded literal src string (e.g. src='/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg'), className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg', and must be wrapped in a div with className='w-full overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-gray-100'. Do not reference award-photo-03.jpeg anywhere.

quotes: फोटोज नही दिख रहे है अभी Awards & Recognition में

acceptanceCriteria: All 7 award photos (award-photo-01, 02, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08) are visible on the About page Awards & Recognition section
Each img tag has a hardcoded literal src path '/assets/generated/award-photo-XX.jpeg' with no template literals
Each img tag has className='w-full h-48 object-cover rounded-lg' applied directly
No reference to award-photo-03.jpeg exists in the component
No conditional rendering, lazy loading, or intersection observer hides any award image
All other content on the About page (founder profile, books section) remains intact
